core:process.core:name: Do Capture Customer Name and Contact

core:action.core:comment: Creates a temporary copy of the tender item on which we perform the tests by creating dummy change items. The temporary tender item is discarded when the process exits.

core:promptState.core:comment: This uses a form to collect the data, validate it and set it on the entity. All the information needed about the entity's properties is contained in the page definition.
